Mewdeko Docs

Class MewdekoModule

Base class for Discord command modules with support for localization and string resources.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description

The target user to check against.

Returns
Type Description

Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong channelId

The ID of the channel where the interaction occurred.

The ID of the message where the interaction occurred.
ulong userId

Determines whether the interaction has already been deferred.
Returns
Type Description
